actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 95-305.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure failed of passage in House under suspension of rules, roll call #235 (245-141).

official_title: A bill to amend the act of July 2, 1940, as amended, to increase the amount authorized to be appropriated for the Canal Zone Biological Area.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 95-305) Increases the appropriations authorization for the Canal Zone Biological Area from $350,000 to $750,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of July 2, 1940, as amended, to increase the amount authorized to be appropriated for the Canal Zone Biological Area.
